targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  sum(count(id)) OVER (ORDER BY interval ASC)
FROM gitlab_ci.pipelines
WHERE project_id = ${project_id} AND $__timeFilter(finished_at)
GROUP BY $__timeInterval(finished_at) as interval
ORDER BY interval

SELECT 
  sum(count(id)) OVER (ORDER BY interval ASC)
FROM gitlab_ci.jobs
WHERE pipeline.project_id = ${project_id} AND $__timeFilter(finished_at)
GROUP BY $__timeInterval(finished_at) as interval
ORDER BY interval

SELECT 
  sum(count(id)) OVER (ORDER BY interval ASC)
FROM gitlab_ci.sections
WHERE pipeline.project_id = ${project_id} AND $__timeFilter(finished_at)
GROUP BY $__timeInterval(finished_at) as interval
ORDER BY interval

SELECT
  sum(count(testcases.id)) OVER (ORDER BY interval ASC)
FROM gitlab_ci.testcases AS testcases
  INNER JOIN gitlab_ci.pipelines AS pipelines ON testcases.testreport.pipeline_id = pipelines.id
WHERE (pipelines.project_id = ${project_id}) AND $__timeFilter(pipelines.finished_at)
GROUP BY $__timeInterval(finished_at) AS interval
ORDER BY interval

SELECT
  count(status) AS success_count,
  ( SELECT count() FROM gitlab_ci.pipelines WHERE project_id = ${project_id} AND $__timeFilter(finished_at) ) AS total_count 
  FROM gitlab_ci.pipelines
  WHERE project_id = ${project_id} AND status = 'success' AND $__timeFilter(finished_at)

SELECT
  count(status) AS success_count,
  ( SELECT count() FROM gitlab_ci.jobs WHERE pipeline.project_id = ${project_id} AND $__timeFilter(finished_at)) AS total_count 
  FROM gitlab_ci.jobs
  WHERE pipeline.project_id = ${project_id} AND status = 'success' AND $__timeFilter(finished_at)

SELECT sum(testsuites.success_count) / sum(testsuites.total_count - testsuites.skipped_count) AS success_ratio
FROM gitlab_ci.testsuites AS testsuites
  INNER JOIN gitlab_ci.pipelines AS pipelines ON testsuites.testreport.pipeline_id = pipelines.id
WHERE
  pipelines.project_id = '${project_id}' AND $__timeFilter(pipelines.finished_at)
GROUP BY toStartOfHour(toDateTime64(pipelines.finished_at, 3)) AS time
ORDER BY time

SELECT $__timeInterval(finished_at) as time, status, count()
  FROM gitlab_ci.pipelines 
  WHERE (project_id = '${project_id}') AND $__timeFilter(time)
  GROUP BY status, time
  ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT $__timeInterval(finished_at) as time, status, count()
  FROM gitlab_ci.jobs 
  WHERE (pipeline.project_id = '${project_id}') AND $__timeFilter(time)
  GROUP BY status, time
  ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT status, count(status)
FROM gitlab_ci.pipelines
WHERE project_id = ${project_id} AND $__timeFilter(finished_at)
GROUP BY status

SELECT id, toDateTime64(finished_at, 3) AS finished_at, status, source, ref, queued_duration, duration
FROM gitlab_ci.pipelines
WHERE project_id = ${project_id} AND $__timeFilter(finished_at)

SELECT status, count(status)
FROM gitlab_ci.jobs 
WHERE pipeline.project_id = ${project_id} AND $__timeFilter(finished_at)
GROUP BY status

SELECT
  regexpExtract(name, '(.+)\\s+\\[.+\\]', 1) AS name,
  avg(duration) AS avg_duration,
  max(duration) AS max_duration
FROM gitlab_ci.jobs
WHERE pipeline.project_id = ${project_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(finished_at)
  AND name != ''
GROUP BY name
ORDER BY avg_duration DESC
LIMIT 5

SELECT
  toDateTime64(finished_at, 3) AS time,
  duration
FROM gitlab_ci.pipelines
WHERE project_id = ${project_id} AND status = 'success' AND $__timeFilter(finished_at)

SELECT
  toDateTime64(finished_at, 3) AS time,
  duration,
  name
FROM gitlab_ci.jobs
WHERE pipeline.project_id = ${project_id} AND status = 'success' AND $__timeFilter(finished_at)

SELECT
  testcases.status, count(testcases.status)
FROM gitlab_ci.testcases AS testcases
  INNER JOIN gitlab_ci.pipelines AS pipelines ON testcases.testreport.pipeline_id = pipelines.id
WHERE
  pipelines.project_id = ${project_id} AND $__timeFilter(pipelines.finished_at)
GROUP BY testcases.status

SELECT
  time,
  sum(testsuites.failed_count + testsuites.error_count) AS failure_count,
  sum(testsuites.success_count) / sum(testsuites.total_count - testsuites.skipped_count) AS success_ratio
FROM gitlab_ci.testsuites AS testsuites
  INNER JOIN gitlab_ci.pipelines AS pipelines ON testsuites.testreport.pipeline_id = pipelines.id
WHERE
  pipelines.project_id = '${project_id}' AND $__timeFilter(pipelines.finished_at)
GROUP BY toStartOfDay(toDateTime64(pipelines.finished_at, 3)) AS time
ORDER BY time DESC

panels.title: Test Result Trend and Pass Rate

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  name, classname, count() AS failed_count, avg(execution_time) AS avg_execution_time
FROM gitlab_ci.testcases AS testcases
  INNER JOIN gitlab_ci.pipelines AS pipelines ON testcases.testreport.pipeline_id = pipelines.id
WHERE testcases.status IN ('failed', 'error')
  AND pipelines.project_id = ${project_id}
  AND $__timeFilter(pipelines.finished_at)
GROUP BY name, classname
ORDER BY failed_count DESC, avg_execution_time DESC
LIMIT 10

panels.title: Top 10 Test Cases by Failure Count
